name: part_006
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the final part of her song 'Future Sky' while sitting on a crescent moon prop.
A transition sequence featuring the audience's light sticks and a stage setup for the next performance.
Nakiri Ayame, Ookami Mio, and Shirakami Fubuki perform 'Erenjoushōka' on a Japanese-themed stage.

subtitles.original: 時間を少しずつ重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering the moments bit by bit

subtitles.original: 苦しみさえ置いてゆくよ
subtitles.english: I'll even leave the pain behind

subtitles.original: もしもね 互いの道がバラバラで
subtitles.english: If, you know, our paths were separate

subtitles.original: すれ違ってばかり そんな日が来ても
subtitles.english: And we just kept passing each other by, even if such a day comes

subtitles.original: いつかまた
subtitles.english: Someday again,

subtitles.original: いつかまた
subtitles.english: Someday again,

subtitles.original: この場所で逢おう
subtitles.english: Let's meet in this place

subtitles.original: 笑って約束した
subtitles.english: We made that promise with a smile

subtitles.original: 君といたメロディーが世界を駆けゆく
subtitles.english: The melody I shared with you runs through the world

subtitles.original: 未来を信じられる勇気に変えてく
subtitles.english: Changing into courage to believe in the future

subtitles.original: 君と並んで
subtitles.english: Standing beside you,

subtitles.original: 同じだけ笑って
subtitles.english: laughing just as much,

subtitles.original: 終わりのない夢を描くよ
subtitles.english: I'll draw an endless dream

subtitles.original: 溢れ出す
subtitles.english: Overflowing,

subtitles.original: そこにFuture Sky
subtitles.english: there is the Future Sky

subtitles.original: 恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Erenjoushōka

subtitles.original: 言えぬ言葉の数を数えてみては
subtitles.english: Counting the number of unspoken words...

subtitles.original: (一二、三四、五六七八と)
subtitles.english: (One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight...)

subtitles.original: 小さなこの両手じゃ数えきれない
subtitles.english: I can't count them all with these small hands

subtitles.original: 愛の歌が 今も生まれ
subtitles.english: A song of love is being born even now

subtitles.original: 顔隠していても
subtitles.english: Even if I hide my face...

subtitles.original: 角も尻尾も隠せない 止められない
subtitles.english: I can't hide my horns or tail. I can't stop it.

subtitles.original: 覗いては雲隠れ 乙女の恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Peeking in and then vanishing, a maiden's love poem

subtitles.original: 気づかずに 気づいていてよ
subtitles.english: Without noticing, please notice me

subtitles.original: 秘め事心は 五月の闇
subtitles.english: My secret heart is like the darkness of May

subtitles.original: その向こうで 舞い踊る
subtitles.english: Dancing on the other side

subtitles.original: 恋、慕う君へと伝うように
subtitles.english: So that it reaches you, the one I love

subtitles.original: 側で聞こえてしまう程 鳴り響く
subtitles.english: It echoes so much it can be heard right beside me

subtitles.original: (ドキドキンドキッ！ドキドキンドキッ！)
subtitles.english: (Heart pounding! Heart pounding!)

subtitles.original: 心塞いでも 増すばかりで
subtitles.english: Even if I close my heart, it only increases

subtitles.original: クラクラする程の感傷
subtitles.english: Sentimentality that makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: 目線逸らしてみても
subtitles.english: Even if I look away...

subtitles.original: 角も尻尾も隠せない 止められない
subtitles.english: I can't hide my horns or tail. I can't stop it.

subtitles.original: 夢見ては雲越えて 乙女の恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Dreaming and crossing clouds, a maiden's love poem

subtitles.original: 愛さずに 愛していてよ
subtitles.english: Without loving me, please love me

subtitles.original: 裏腹心は 五月の闇
subtitles.english: My contradictory heart is like the darkness of May

subtitles.original: その向こうに 何を見る
subtitles.english: What do you see beyond that?

subtitles.original: 愛、慕う君へと届くように
subtitles.english: So that it reaches you, the one I love

subtitles.original: 真心の鬼火 そっと灯す
subtitles.english: Gently lighting the soul-fire of sincerity

subtitles.original: アイラブユウの数 光らせば
subtitles.english: If I make the number of "I love you's" shine...

subtitles.original: 化かしてあげましょう ほら夢中
subtitles.english: I'll bewitch you, look, you're entranced

subtitles.original: 捧げるものなら 辛口で
subtitles.english: If it's something to offer, make it dry

subtitles.original: 高く声上げりゃ さあ集まれ
subtitles.english: Raise your voices high, now gather 'round

subtitles.original: 何処に居たって 遠く響かせ
subtitles.english: No matter where you are, let it echo far

subtitles.original: 物の怪乙女の三人衆
subtitles.english: The trio of monster maidens

subtitles.original: 其処退け其処退け 我等が通る
subtitles.english: Make way, make way, we're coming through!

subtitles.original: 願えばいつかは 晴れよと
subtitles.english: Wishing that someday it will be clear...

subtitles.original: 闇に隠し心...
subtitles.english: Heart hidden in the darkness...
